G

GameLogic - Class in blackjack.daniel.ibanez
The GameLogic class runs the logic of the blackjack game.
GameLogic() - Constructor for class blackjack.daniel.ibanez.GameLogic
Initializes dealer and players, and waits for the player to click the DEAL/STAND/BET buttons OR calls 'newHand' method when no human is in the game (this happens when the user enters 'ai' as name in the input dialog).

getCardAt(int) - Method in class blackjack.daniel.ibanez.Hand
Returns a card from the given position on the list.
getHand() - Method in class blackjack.daniel.ibanez.Player
Returns a Hand object containing the cards the player is holding.
getHandValue(boolean) - Method in class blackjack.daniel.ibanez.Dealer
Returns the sum of all values in the dealer's hand.
getHandValue() - Method in class blackjack.daniel.ibanez.Player
Returns the sum of all values in the player's hand.
getName() - Method in class blackjack.daniel.ibanez.Player
 
getNextCard() - Method in class blackjack.daniel.ibanez.Deck
Returns the first card and removes it from the deck.

getSuit() - Method in class blackjack.daniel.ibanez.Card

getValue() - Method in class blackjack.daniel.ibanez.Card
Returns card value, a number between 1 and 13.
getValue() - Method in class blackjack.daniel.ibanez.Hand
Calculates the sum of values of all cards in the hand.
